definition: magic transformation performed by Daoist immortal/fig. to reveal/to enlighten

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
variant of 花[hua1]

sentences.english: A level two reiki attunement allows one to heal graver maladies and emotional ills.
sentences.chinese: 第二階段靈氣點化允許療愈深刻病疾和情緒問題。

sentences.english: Love is a magic wand, which can turn boring life to glod!
sentences.chinese: 愛情，是一根魔杖，能把最無聊的生活點化成黃金。

sentences.english: They appear as grisly warrior women armed with spears enchanted to kill.
sentences.chinese: 她們的外貌是恐怖的女武士，手持爲死亡點化的長矛。

sentences.english: Carry this picture with you on the day of your attunement .
sentences.chinese: 抓走這個圖片用在你有一天你的點化用。

sentences.english: A first level reiki attunement allows one to heal himself and others of minor discomforts .
sentences.chinese: 第二階段靈氣點化允許療愈深刻病疾和情緒問題。

definition: a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
to become enlightened (Buddhism)
to explain/to comment
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
to be confused/to be baffled
void/hollow/empty
in other words
to instruct/to teach/guidance/teaching
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
to be obsessive/to persist obstinately
quick/alert/efficacious/effective/to come true/spirit/departed soul/coffin
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
omnipotent
Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
